archimate:Resource.name: Governance Gateway
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is the gateway of all the ABBs in the Governance Layer to the other layers. In other words, it provides a focal point for processing both outgoing and incoming requests for governance management to and from the other eight layers.

properties.value: This ABB is the gateway of all the ABBs in the Governance Layer to the other layers. In other words, it provides a focal point for processing both outgoing and incoming requests for governance management to and from the other eight layers.
